column2: "Delightful! Gahahaha...heha! This has really been a blast!"
"You lunatic! You think you can take all four of us?"
"Hey! Sina! It's still not finished yet?"
"Just a little more... but..."
"Just a little more, eh? Hey! Sina!"
"Yes, Master?"
"Hey, Sina? You would do anything for me, right?"
"Of course."
"I see... I'm so glad to hear that. Well, sorry then, but I'm going to have to ask that you..."
"...die for me!"
"Gettemhart, you bastard!"
"What are you so angry about, Zeno?"
"Why would you kill your own comrade? <%me>, help her!"
"M... Master... Gettem... hart..."
"Was Sina able to be of use to you?"
"Yes, Sina! Thanks to you, you-know-who is coming back."
"No way! You'd use that method!?"
"What's going on?"
"This torrent of photons... The revival of Dark Falz..."
"Come on, Dark Falz! You're strong, right? The strongest, from what I hear."
"Show me that power! The power to destroy everything!"
"I'll rip and tear it all to shreds! I'll crush you!"
"Wh... What's... this? What the hell is going on...?"
"Gettemhart!"
"Don't get any closer, lest you get pulled in."
"Get pulled in? Casra, how do you know about all of this?"
"To continue my previous story..."
"40 years ago, the ARKS defeated Dark Falz, but they weren't able to destroy him completely."
"They were only able to seal him away. And they have kept him sealed on this planet."
"Meanwhile, they have deceived everyone into thinking that he really could be defeated."
"What...?"
"So that monument...?"
"...is where Dark Falz is sealed, yes. Only, that seal has just been broken."
"Damn it! Damn it! What the hell is going on? Damn it!!"
"Don't come inside of me!"
"Dark Falz is essentially the same as the Darkers."
"That is to say, they both infect and consume that which they destroy."
"Damn it!!!! Sina! Hey! Sina!"
"...that is... WE..."
"I see! I see! I see! I see! I see! I see! I see! Bwahahaha... hahahaha!"
"It's been too long! The blue sky! The green grass!"
"I am a being of pure strife. It has been far too long."
"That's not Gettemhart. What are you?"
"Behold! I am [Elder]! Dark Falz [Elder]!"
"Dark Falz [Elder]!?"
"Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhh-"
"It feels good to have blood coursing through my veins. Destruction... I crave it!"
"You ARKS have the distinct pleasure of being my first victims!"
